welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Lower Moreland, a charming city known for its rich history and scenic landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Philadelphia Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at North Philadelphia Airport handles all air freight shipments.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport, primarily serving regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wings Field Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Wings Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Doylestown Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Doylestown Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves a mix of domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Upper Bucks Airport serves all incoming and outgoing flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
